==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''3-Swing Combo:''' Performs a combo attack that consists of an upward hammer swing, a downward slam, and a sideways swing, dealing '''100% ATK''', '''100% ATK''', '''150% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Physical DMG}} or {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}}.
*'''Charge Slam:''' Charges at the player and performs a powerful downward slam, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} on collision and '''150% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Physical DMG}} or {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}} with the slam.
*'''Electro Armor:''' Upon reaching '''50%''' HP or after some time has passed, generates an {{Electro}} [[Shields|shield]], granting them a massive increase in [[Resistance]]s, infusing their hammer with {{Electro}} and making their attacks Faster. The shield is weakest to {{Color|Cryo}}. Breaking the shield will leave them stunned and vulnerable to attack.

==Notable Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguards==
===Corporal Mashkov===
A Corporal encoutered during the World Quest [[A Company Vanishing Into the Deep]] who attacks [[Anton]]'s group alongside two of his men for the supplies the Traveler gave them. The Traveler drives them away. When fighting him, he continuously loses HP due to hunger.
